title: Private Network: Fatal: Failed to start mining: etherbase missing: etherbase must be explicitly specified
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.11.4-stable
CL client & version: e.g. lighthouse/nimbus/prysm@v1.0.0
Commit hash : 7e3b149be054053fd1177deaba3caf60d5f5d30b

#### Expected behaviour

Geth runs the signer node in a Clique (PoA) private network!

#### Actual behaviour

Geth can't run the signer node and this error appears on the PowerShell:
`Fatal: Failed to start mining: etherbase missing: etherbase must be explicitly specified`

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1) Config file (`Genesis.json`):
```
{

      "config":{
  
         "chainId":1111,
  
         "homesteadBlock":0,
  
         "eip158Block":0,
  
         "eip155Block":0,
  
         "eip150Block":0,
  
         "byzantiumBlock":0,
  
         "constantinopleBlock":0,
  
         "petersburgBlock":0,
  
         "istanbulBlock":0,
  
         "berlinBlock":0,
  
         "londonBlock":0,
  
         "eip5133Block":0,
         "clique": {
                         "period": 3,
                   "epoch": 28800
             }
  
     },
  
     "difficulty":"0x64",
  
     "gasLimit":"0x6ACFC0",
  
     "extradata":"",
  
     "alloc":{
     "0xcf8ad8665fb67cb24cd97ae8fab2a224afe31a15":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"},
     "0x7f5bd8332eaead699b39e12fac0015e1b02a2765":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"},
     "0xeee2d20b5e3625cd2f2e8cfb21b292f578f41a2e":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"},
     "0xb8f5fcd65b31bc186b89c3959fb984f221aa24e9":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"},
     "0x172aa9eb02bae3d09201f22ad8e0664aa3c1657d":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"},
     "0xb6226d8e5a0d677557a958b244a303061f578ac0":{"balance":"100000000000000000000"}
     }
  
  }
```
2) Geth init:
`geth --datadir C:\...\Local --identity "PrivateEtherem" init "C:\...\Local\Genesis.json"`

3) Run the signer node by Geth:

`geth --datadir C:\...\Local --cache 512 --identity "PrivateEthereum" --networkid 1111 --port 30300 --netrestrict 192.168.10.0/24  --nat extip:192.168.10.24 --ws --allow-insecure-unlock --ws.addr 192.168.10.24 --ws.port 8551 --ws.api eth,net,web3,personal,admin,miner --ws.origins "*" --mine --miner.threads 10`

4) This error occurred:

```
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.197] Loaded most recent local block           number=0 hash=8eb678..2d431c td=100 age=53y11mo2w
WARN [03-11|10:46:32.203] Failed to load snapshot                  err="missing or corrupted snapshot"
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.204] Rebuilding state snapshot
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.205] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=b0f289..19980a accounts=0 slots=0 storage=0.00B dangling=0 elapsed="629.8Âµs"
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.208] Generated state snapshot                 accounts=6 slots=0 storage=282.00B dangling=0 elapsed=4.006ms
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.218] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.220] Stored checkpoint snapshot to disk       number=0 hash=8eb678..2d431c
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.222] Gasprice oracle is ignoring threshold set threshold=2
WARN [03-11|10:46:32.223] Error reading unclean shutdown markers   error="leveldb: not found"
WARN [03-11|10:46:32.224] Engine API enabled                       protocol=eth
WARN [03-11|10:46:32.225] Engine API started but chain not configured for merge yet
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.226] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/SmartCure/v1.11.4-stable-7e3b149b/windows-amd64/go1.20.2
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.240] Mapped network port                      proto=tcp extport=30300 intport=30300 interface=ExtIP(192.168.10.24)
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.240] Mapped network port                      proto=udp extport=30300 intport=30300 interface=ExtIP(192.168.10.24)
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.242] New local node record                    seq=1,678,518,992,239 id=a7bd5e24fac68951 ip=192.168.10.24 udp=30300 tcp=30300
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.248] Started P2P networking                   self=enode://e5f5d536cf537188bd38208d00de0adeee61c8a37e159ade9088ce96ac4232199b9535d67a83e2d4ddc757efeafdec7ebd32592a52a5b6838510d072b3d30a02@192.168.10.24:30300
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.249] IPC endpoint opened                      url=\\.\pipe\geth.ipc
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.255] Generated JWT secret                     path=C:\...\Local\geth\jwtsecret
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.255] WebSocket enabled                        url=ws://192.168.10.24:8551
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.263] WebSocket enabled                        url=ws://127.0.0.1:8551
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.265] HTTP server started                      endpoint=127.0.0.1:8551 auth=true prefix= cors=localhost vhosts=localhost
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.268] Transaction pool price threshold updated price=0
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.269] Updated mining threads                   threads=10
INFO [03-11|10:46:32.270] Transaction pool price threshold updated price=1,000,000,000
ERROR[03-11|10:46:32.271] Cannot start mining without etherbase    err="etherbase must be explicitly specified"
Fatal: Failed to start mining: etherbase missing: etherbase must be explicitly specified
```

It says "Cannot start mining without etherbase", and that etherbase must be explicitly specified. 

That means you need to specify --etherbase as a command line parameter.

> It says "Cannot start mining without etherbase", and that etherbase must be explicitly specified. That means you need to specify --etherbase as a command line parameter.

Do you mean like this?

`--miner.etherbase 0x123...`

So what does `extradata` in Genesis file?

I need the specified accounts, in `extradata`, validate tx and seal blocks. It is a Clique based network and we expect no need to specify signers again after Geth initialiazed to Genesis file.

`etherbase` needs to be set to the address which the node will signing blocks as. The account must be available locally. This means you need to add the private key to the client. You can see more information about how to do this here: https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/tools/clef/clique-signing

> > It says "Cannot start mining without etherbase", and that etherbase must be explicitly specified. That means you need to specify --etherbase as a command line parameter.
> 
> Do you mean like this?
> 
> `--miner.etherbase 0x123...`
> 
> So what does `extradata` in Genesis file?
> 
> I need the specified accounts, in `extradata`, validate tx and seal blocks. It is a Clique based network and we expect no need to specify signers again after Geth initialiazed to Genesis file.

have you fix this it?
